text.div:
MolicAVC

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

https://molic-avc.gabriellesantosleandro.com/ImplementationGuide/guide

FHIR Implementation Guide for Stroke: A Dual Focus on the Patient's Journey and Outcome Measures

name: MolicAVC
title: FHIR Implementation Guide for Stroke
description: FHIR Implementation Guide for Stroke: A Dual Focus on the Patient's Journey and Outcome Measures

extension.valueMarkdown: Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on HL7 Terminology
Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on the HL7 Extension Pack

resource.name: Cardiovascular Comorbidities
resource.description: Indicate which comorbidities the patient is living with.

resource.name: Stroke Severity: Consciousness
resource.description: Indicate the patient’s level of consciousness measured on hospital arrival.

resource.name: Diagnosis Evidence Base
resource.description: Indicate how the diagnosis was made.

resource.name: Discharge Destination Following Acute Care Hospitalization
resource.description: Indicate the patient’s discharge destination from acute care hospital.

resource.name: Estimated Stroke Severity: based on NIHSS Category
resource.description: Indicate the estimated stroke severity category by the NIH Stroke Scale (NIHSS).

resource.name: Hemicraniectomy
resource.description: Indicate if the patient underwent hemicraniectomy.

resource.name: Prior Atrial Fibrillation and Flutter
resource.description: Indicate whether the person has ever been diagnosed with atrial fibrillation and flutter.

resource.name: Prior Diabetes Mellitus
resource.description: Indicate if the patient has a documented history of diabetes mellitus (regardless of duration of disease or need for anti-diabetic agents).

resource.name: Prior Hyperlipidemia
resource.description: Indicate whether the patient has ever been diagnosed with hyperlipidemia.

resource.name: Prior Hypertension
resource.description: Indicate whether the patient has a documented history of hypertension, diagnosed and treated with medication and/or diet and/or exercise.

resource.name: Prior Ischemic Heart Disease
resource.description: Indicate whether the patient has ever been diagnosed with ischemic heart disease (including myocardial infarction).

resource.name: Prior Myocardial Infarction
resource.description: Indicate whether the patient has a documented history of myocardial infarction.

resource.name: Prior Stroke excluding Transient Ischemic Attacks
resource.description: Indicate whether the patient was ever diagnosed with a stroke (excluding transient ischemic attacks).

resource.name: Prior Transient Ischemic Attacks
resource.description: Indicate whether the patient was ever diagnosed with a Transient Ischemic Attacks.

resource.name: Procoagulant Reversal Therapy
resource.description: Indicate if the patient received procoagulant reversal therapy.

resource.name: Inpatient Acute Care Rehabilitation
resource.description: Indicate whether there is dedicated stroke rehabilitation during acute care.

resource.name: Post Acute Care Rehabilitation
resource.description: Indicate whether there is dedicated stroke rehabilitation during post-acute care, either hospital based or out patient/home based.

resource.name: Healthcare Facility based on the Brazilian RNDS
resource.description:
The Organization Profile encompasses all healthcare institutions related to stroke care, based on the 
Brazilian National Data Network (RNDS).

resource.name: Stroke Patient based on the Brazilian RNDS
resource.description: This profile stores demographics and other administrative information about a patient with stroke, based on the Brazilian National Data Network (RNDS).

resource.name: Stroke Practitioner based on Brazilian RNDS
resource.description:
This profile encompasses all health professionals involved in the healthcare process and related health services 
as part of their formal responsibilities, conforming to the standards of the Brazilian National Data Network (RNDS).

resource.name: Stroke Recurrence.
resource.description: Indicate if the patient had a new stroke within 90 days of their first stroke occurrence.

resource.name: Stroke Severity: NIHSS Score
resource.description: Indicate the stroke severity as measured by the NIH Stroke Scale (NIHSS). Report the raw (uncategorized) NIHSS score.

resource.name: Stroke Type
resource.description: Indicate Stroke Type.

resource.name: Symptomatic Intracranial Hemorrhage
resource.description: Indicate if the patient developed symptomatic intracerebral hemorrhage after treatment of ischemic stroke with intravenous thrombolysis and/or thrombectomy.

resource.name: Duration of Stroke Symptoms
resource.description: Indicate the duration of the stroke symptoms measured on hospital arrival.

resource.name: Thrombectomy
resource.description: Indicate if the patient underwent thrombectomy.

resource.name: Thrombolytic Therapy
resource.description: Indicate if the patient received intravenous thrombolytic therapy.

resource.name: Ethnicity
resource.description: Extension to capture the patient's ethnicity which represents their cultural background or heritage.

resource.name: Gender Identity
resource.description: Extension of the patient's gender.

resource.name: Race
resource.description: Extension that represents the race of a patient.

resource.name: Cardiovascular Comorbidities
resource.description: Valueset that indicate which comorbidities the patient is living with. Select all conditions that apply.

resource.name: State of Consciousness.
resource.description: ValueSet based on the ICHOM standard that indicates the patient's state of consciousness as measured upon arrival at the reference hospital.

resource.name: Diagnostic Evidence Base
resource.description: ValueSet that indicates which diagnostic evidence base was used for its realization

resource.name: Discharge Location
resource.description: ValueSet about discharge destination following acute care hospitalization. What type of place was the patient discharged to?

resource.name: Estimated stroke severity using the NIHSS.
resource.description: ValueSet that intended to categorize the severity of the stroke based on the National Institutes of Health Stroke Scale (NIHSS).

resource.name: Gender Identity
resource.description: ValueSet for Gender Identity based on LOINC.

resource.name: Live Alone Pre-Stroke
resource.description: ValueSet indicating whether a patient lived alone prior to a stroke event based on ICHOM terminology.

resource.name: Patient's Residence Post to a Stroke
resource.description: ValueSet that represents the patient's most recent place of residence after the occurrence of a stroke based on ICHOM code.

resource.name: Patient's Residence Prior to a Stroke
resource.description: ValueSet that represents the patient's most recent place of residence before the occurrence of a stroke based on ICHOM code.

resource.name: Yes, No and Unknown
resource.description: ValueSet with responses Yes, No, and Unknown

resource.name: PROMIS-10 Response Questionnaire
resource.description: ValueSet that defines the response values for the PROMIS-10 (Patient-Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System 10-item short form) Questionnaire.

resource.name: Simplified modified Ranking Scale questionnaire (SMRSq)
resource.description: ValueSet that defines the response values for the simplified modified Ranking Scale questionnaire.

resource.name: Smoking Status
resource.description: ValueSet for Smoking Status. A person's current and past smoking behavior.

resource.name: Prestroke and Poststroke Functional Status: Ambulation
resource.description: ValueSet that defines the response values for the Prestroke and Poststroke Functional Status: Ambulation.

resource.name: Prestroke and Poststroke Functional Status: Dressing
resource.description: ValueSet that defines the response values for the Prestroke and Poststroke Functional Status: Dressing.

resource.name: Prestroke and Poststroke Functional Status: Toileting
resource.description: ValueSet that defines the response values for the Prestroke and Poststroke Functional Status: Toileting.

resource.name: Stroke type based on ICHOM
resource.description: ValueSet that aims to categorize the stroke type according to the ICHOM standard.

resource.name: Duration of Stroke Symptoms
resource.description: ValueSet that categorizes the duration of stroke symptoms, considering the time from symptom onset to admission at the reference hospital.

resource.name: Cardiovascular Comorbidities
resource.description: CodeSystem that indicate which comorbidities the patient is living with. Select all conditions that apply.

resource.name: State of Consciousness according to the ICHOM standard
resource.description: CodeSystem based on the ICHOM standard that indicates the patient's state of consciousness as measured upon arrival at the reference hospital.

resource.name: Diagnostic Evidence Base
resource.description: CodeSystem that indicates which diagnostic evidence base was used for its realization

resource.name: Discharge Location
resource.description: CodeSystem about Discharge destination following acute care hospitalization. What type of place was the patient discharged to?

resource.name: Estimated stroke severity using the NIHSS.
resource.description: CodeSystem that intends to categorize the severity of the stroke based on the National Institutes of Health Stroke Scale (NIHSS).

resource.name: Live Alone Pre-Stroke
resource.description: CodeSystem indicating whether a patient lived alone prior to a stroke event based on ICHOM terminology.

resource.name: Patient's Residence Post to a Stroke
resource.description: CodeSystem that represents the patient's most recent place of residence after the occurrence of a stroke based on ICHOM code.

resource.name: Patient's Residence Prior to a Stroke
resource.description: CodeSystem that represents the patient's most recent place of residence before the occurrence of a stroke based on ICHOM code.

resource.name: PROMIS-10 Response Questionnaire
resource.description: CodeSystem that defines the response values for the PROMIS-10 (Patient-Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System 10-item short form) Questionnaire.

resource.name: Simplified Modified Ranking Scale questionnaire (sMRSq)
resource.description: CodeSystem that defines the response values for the simplified modified Ranking Scale questionnaire (sMRSq).

resource.name: Smoking Status
resource.description: CodeSystem for Smoking Status. A person's current and past smoking behavior.

resource.name: Prestroke and Poststroke Functional Status
resource.description: CodeSystem that defines the response values for the Prestroke and Poststroke Functional Status.

resource.name: Stroke Type
resource.description: CodeSystem that aims to categorize the stroke type according to the ICHOM standard.

resource.name: Duration of Stroke Symptoms
resource.description: CodeSystem that categorizes the duration of stroke symptoms, considering the time from symptom onset to admission at the reference hospital.

resource.name: Clinical Response Questionnaire 04 - Annual Follow-up
resource.description: This questionnaire is meant to assess the clinical response in stroke patients at annual follow-up, from 1 year to 5 years post admission.

resource.name: Clinical Response Questionnaire 01 - Baseline
resource.description: This questionnaire is meant to assess the clinical response in stroke patients at the initial point of assessment, which would be the first doctor's visit.

resource.name: Clinical Response Questionnaire 02 - Discharge or 7 days post admission
resource.description: This questionnaire is meant to assess the clinical response in stroke patients at the patient discharge or 7 days post admission, whichever comes first.

resource.name: Clinical Response Questionnaire 03 - 90 days post admission
resource.description: This questionnaire is meant to assess the clinical response in stroke patients at 90 days post admission.

resource.name: Cardiovascular Comorbidities
resource.description: Example of Cardiovascular Comorbidities. Indicate which comorbidities the patient is living with.

resource.name: Stroke Severity: Consciousness
resource.description: Example of Stroke Severity: Consciousness. Indicate the patient’s level of consciousness measured on hospital arrival.

resource.name: Diagnosis Evidence Base
resource.description: Example of Diagnosis Evidence Base. Indicate how the diagnosis was made.

resource.name: Discharge Destination Following Acute Care Hospitalization
resource.description: Example of Discharge Destination Following Acute Care Hospitalization.  Indicate the patient’s discharge destination from acute care hospital.

resource.name: Estimated Stroke Severity: based on NIHSS Category
resource.description: Example of Estimated Stroke Severity: based on NIHSS Category. Indicate the estimated stroke severity category by the NIH Stroke Scale (NIHSS).

resource.description: Example of Hemicraniectomy. Indicate if the patient underwent hemicraniectomy.

resource.description: Example of Prior Hypertension. Indicate whether the patient has a documented history of hypertension, diagnosed and treated with medication and/or diet and/or exercise.

resource.name: Prior Ischemic Heart Disease
resource.description: Example of Prior Ischemic Heart Disease. Indicate whether the patient has ever been diagnosed with ischemic heart disease (including myocardial infarction).

resource.description: Example of Prior Myocardial Infarction. Indicate whether the patient has a documented history of myocardial infarction.

resource.description: Example of Prior Stroke excluding Transient Ischemic Attacks. Indicate whether the patient was ever diagnosed with a stroke (excluding transient ischemic attacks).

resource.name: Prior Transient Ischemic Attacks
resource.description: Example of Prior Transient Ischemic Attacks. Indicate whether the patient was ever diagnosed with a Transient Ischemic Attacks.

resource.description: Example of Procoagulant Reversal Therapy. Indicate if the patient received procoagulant reversal therapy.

resource.name: Inpatient Acute Care Rehabilitation
resource.description: Example of Inpatient Acute Care Rehabilitation. Indicate whether there is dedicated stroke rehabilitation during acute care.

resource.name: Post Acute Care Rehabilitation
resource.description: Example of Post Acute Care Rehabilitation. Indicate whether there is dedicated stroke rehabilitation during post-acute care, either hospital based or out patient/home based.

resource.name: Stroke Recurrence.
resource.description: Example of Stroke Recurrence. Indicate if the patient had a new stroke within 90 days of their first stroke occurrence.

resource.name: Stroke Severity: NIHSS Score
resource.description: Example of Stroke Severity: NIHSS Score. Indicate the stroke severity as measured by the NIH Stroke Scale (NIHSS). Report the raw (uncategorized) NIHSS score.

resource.name: Stroke Type
resource.description: Example of Stroke Type. Indicate Stroke Type.

resource.name: Symptomatic Intracranial Hemorrhage
resource.description: Example of Symptomatic Intracranial Hemorrhage. Indicate if the patient developed symptomatic intracerebral hemorrhage after treatment of ischemic stroke with intravenous thrombolysis and/or thrombectomy.

resource.name: Duration of Stroke Symptoms
resource.description: Example of Duration of Stroke Symptoms. Indicate the duration of the stroke symptoms measured on hospital arrival.

resource.description: Example of Thrombectomy. Indicate if the patient underwent thrombectomy.

resource.description: Example of Thrombolytic Therapy. Indicate if the patient received intravenous thrombolytic therapy.

resource.name: Patient Reported Questionnaire 01 - Baseline
resource.description: This questionnaire is designed to assess the patient-reported response in stroke patients at the initial point of assessment.

resource.name: Patient Reported Questionnaire 02 - Discharge or 7 days post admission
resource.description: This questionnaire is designed to assess the patient-reported response in stroke at the patient discharge or 7 days post admission, whichever comes first.

resource.name: Patient Reported Questionnaire 03 - 90 days post admission
resource.description: This questionnaire is designed to assess the patient-reported response in stroke at 90 days post admission.

resource.name: Healthcare Facility
resource.description: Example of Healthcare Facility related to stroke care, based on the Brazilian National Data Network (RNDS).

resource.name: Stroke Patient
resource.description: Example of Stroke Patient. This example presents a profile for stroke patient based on Brazilian RNDS.

resource.name: Stroke Practitioner
resource.description: This example presents a practitioner profile for stroke attendance based on Brazilian National Data Network.
